Package Program3GUI

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Program3GUI.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class used to define and control the functionalities of the GUI. Will coordinate with FXML file.

  • Method Details

    • clearGuiInputs

      private void clearGuiInputs()
      Function to clear the gui inputs after each time "Add"/"Remove"/"Print" button is pressed.

    • fundingdisabler

      public void fundingdisabler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Disables/enables the funding textbox based on whether or not funds checkbox is checked or not
      Parameters:
      event - Change of state of funding checkbox between checked and unchecked

    • typeSelectionDisabler

      public void typeSelectionDisabler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Controller Method to disable/enable different sections of student specific information input based on which option (type of student) is selected. Only section corresponding to selected option (Instate, Outstate, International) will be enabled, others will be disabled. It will also clear other types everytime the user selects a different option for type of student clear any currently entered type
      Parameters:
      event - Toggling of Instate, Outstate, or International to trigger this function.

    • setStudentType

      public void setStudentType​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets type specific (type-specific = type of student) information for type of student selected based on certain events. Info such as funds or either exchange or not are set. Events that trigger this are filling out funds or making selection of exchange or not and etc.
      Parameters:
      event - Actions performed to specify type-specific information

    • actionWhenAddButtonPressed

      public void actionWhenAddButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The action(s) that will be performed when the add button is pressed, mainly to add student to TuitionManager list.
      Parameters:
      event - Button press of Add button in the GUI

    • addSpecificTypeStudent

      private void addSpecificTypeStudent​(java.lang.String fname, java.lang.String lname, int credits)
      Will call the specific function based on the type of student being added.
      Parameters:
      fname - Student's first name
      lname - Student's last name
      credits - Amount of credits student is taking

    • addInstateStudent

      private void addInstateStudent​(java.lang.String fname, java.lang.String lname, int credits)
      Will add instate student to the list
      Parameters:
      fname - student's first name
      lname - student's last name
      credits - credits the student is taking

      Parameters:

      credits - credits the student is taking

      public void actionWhenRemoveButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - Pressing of the Remove button

    • checkTextFieldContent

      private boolean checkTextFieldContent​(java.lang.String content)
      Checks to see if names entered in text fields are there and are in proper format.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the text field being checked
      Returns:
      true if checks succeed, false otherwise

    • parseCreditsValue

      private int parseCreditsValue​(java.lang.String creditString) throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
      Will parse the value inputted for credits to see how many credits a student is taking. Take input from the credits input textfield.
      Parameters:
      creditString - string that holds the number of credits inputted
      Returns:
      int value of the credits being taken
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - if input is not an integer or contains non-numeric characters then this will be thrown

    • isGreaterThanZero

      private boolean isGreaterThanZero​(int numericValue)
      Will check if a number inputted is greater than zero or not
      Parameters:
      numericValue - number being checked
      Returns:
      true if is greater than zero, false otherwise.

    • actionWhenPrintButtonPressed

      public void actionWhenPrintButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Prints all the student to the output textbox area when "Print" button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Print button being pressed
